title: Refunds
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase. No exceptions are made after 8 days.

title: Password Reset
content: Reset password from Settings > Security. An email link will be sent to your registered address.

title: Account Deletion
content: To delete your account, contact support or use the 'Close Account' button in Privacy settings.

title: Subscription Plans
content: We offer Basic ($10/mo), Pro ($20/mo), and Enterprise (custom pricing).

title: Payment Methods
content: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

title: Two-Factor Auth
content: Enable 2FA via the Security tab using any standard authenticator app like Google or Authy.

title: API Rate Limits
content: Standard users are limited to 100 requests per 15 minutes to ensure server stability.

title: Data Privacy
content: We do not sell user data. All data is encrypted at rest using AES-256 standards.

title: Mobile App
content: Our   app is available on both iOS and Android. Search for 'ChatBot Pro' in the store.

title: Customer Support
content: Support is available 24/7 via email at support@example.com or live chat on the website.

title: Shipping Policy
content: Digital goods are delivered instantly. Physical goods ship within 3-5 business days.

title: Trial Period
content: New users get a 14-day free trial of the Pro features. No credit card required.

title: Company Location
content: Our headquarters are located in Hyderabad, Telangana, India.

title: Language Support
content: Currently, we only provide official documentation and support in English.
